Question: It is difficult to say which was more instrumental in this person becoming a champion.
Hints: This person' mother, Gloria, took him to Southern California to be coached by Pancho Segura, starting at age 16, in 1968.
This person was allowed only one serve per point and Navratilova was allowed to hit into half the doubles court.
This person lost this quarterfinal, 6–7, 3–6 to Marc Rosset.
